description:
it does not operate normally then start after you stop the case vm bootable volume. 

The following error may occur. 
OSError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/var/lib/nova/instances/a7cdb294-a8ce-4aa2-9c49-ac3484b73262/disk'

This problem, because using a local disk information without using connection_info the volume.
